name: company_name
label: Company Name
description: The company name that will appear on your pages. If not provided the company name from your account profile will be used.

name: page_title
label: Page Title
description: The page title that will be displayed by the browser.

name: logo
label: Logo
description: The logo to display in the upper left of the page.

name: favicon
label: Favicon
description: The page favicon image. Providing a square image is highly recommended; images that are not square will automatically be cropped square. For maximum compatibility, the image you provide should be no larger than 196 x 196 pixels.
